name: Copycat Curse
description:
Battle your way through the mysterious dungeon with fast-paced arcane warfare in Copycat Curse. Made in 48 hours during the GMTK Game Jam, you will find that your skills are also in the hands of your enemies! Are you the one that will successfully help the purple mage, Gwen, clear the dungeon?! Play for yourself and find out!

Controls:

Movement: W-A-S-D

Dash: Space

Activate Spell: Left Click

Change wand: 1, 2, 3 in number row

Hold X for 3 seconds to skip a level if anything goes wrong.

Music and SFX Credits :)
